content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The potential tenant, Yi-Nuo Wang, was looking for a price within their budget, while I was looking for the highest possible price. We did not reach a mutual agreement on the price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likely, how would you rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement in the future? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I cannot provide a specific number, as the likelihood of reaching an agreement in the future would depend on various factors and could change.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I do not feel that I was discriminated against or offended during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
